name: Harlech Beach
best_for: Best for castle views, dunes and space.
description: Vast beach beneath dramatic castle. Royal St David's golf course behind dunes. Usually uncrowded despite scale. Spectacular sunsets.

name: Barmouth Beach (Abermaw)
best_for: Best for families, promenade and traditional seaside.
description: Classic seaside resort beach. Huge expanse of sand, donkey rides, harbour, and views up the Mawddach Estuary.

name: Fairbourne Beach
best_for: Best for walking, quiet and views.
description: Two-mile stretch of golden sand at low tide backed by a steep pebble bank. Famous for its miniature railway.

name: Tywyn Beach
best_for: Best for families, surfing and dolphins.
description: Long sandy beach with a promenade. Popular for surfing and spotting Cardigan Bay dolphins. Sunset cinema nearby.

name: Aberdovey Beach
best_for: Best for sailing, crabbing and families.
description: Where the mountains meet the sea. Miles of sand dunes stretching north. Sailing hub with picturesque pastel houses.

name: Black Rock Sands (Morfa Bychan)
best_for: Best for cars, families and picnics.
description: Famous open sands where you can drive your car onto the beach. Caves to explore at the western end. Popular with families.

name: Criccieth Beach
best_for: Best for castle views, families and history.
description: Beaches split by a headland topped with a medieval castle. South-facing with views across Cardigan Bay to Harlech.

name: Llandanwg Beach
best_for: Best for rock pooling, church and shelter.
description: Sheltered beach with a medieval church in the dunes (St Tanwg). Great for rock pooling and kayaking in the lagoon.

name: Bennar Beach (Dyffryn)
best_for: Best for space, dunes and naturism.
description: Massive expanse of sand backed by high dunes. Wooden boardwalk access. Includes a designated naturist section.

name: Shell Island (Mochras)
best_for: Best for shells, camping and wildness.
description: A peninsula that becomes an island at high tide. Famous for the variety of seashells found on its beaches. Huge campsite.
